attic.build-three: node scripts/build3modules.js; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs etc/threelibs -d etc/threelibs
attic.build-as: mkdir lib; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs src -d lib

scripts.zip: rm asx.zip; zip -r asx.zip etc src test test.html scripts
scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-docs && npm run build-deps
scripts.build-deps: mkdir -p etc/threelibs; cp node_modules/lzma/src/lzma.js node_modules/lzma/src/lzma_worker.js node_modules/pako/dist/pako.min.js node_modules/three/build/three.js node_modules/three/build/three.min.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/FlyControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/controls/FirstPersonControls.js node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/stats.min.js node_modules/three/examples/js/libs/dat.gui.min.js etc
scripts.build-src: npm run build-test && npm run bundle
scripts.watch: npm run build-test -- --watch & npm run bundle -- --watch
scripts.git-tag: git tag -a 'v2.0.0' # Change vx.x.x, run git-tag, change version: above
scripts.git-prep: npm run build && git add --all && git status
scripts.git-commit: git commit -v && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.make-page: git merge master && npm run clean && npm run build && git add --all && git add -f docs test/scripts etc && git commit -m 'master merge'
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && npm run make-page && git push origin gh-pages --follow-tags && git checkout master
